body:
**OpenRa crash at start with Eluant.LuaException:**

```
./AppRun 
Platform is Linux
Engine version is release-20180923
Using SDL 2 with OpenGL renderer
Desktop resolution: 1920x1080
No custom resolution provided, using desktop resolution
Using resolution: 1920x1080
Using window scale 1,00
OpenGL version: 3.0 Mesa 18.1.7
Using default sound device
Internal mods:
	modcontent: Mod Content Manager (release-20180923)
	ra: Red Alert (release-20180923)
External mods:
	cnc-release-20180307: Tiberian Dawn (release-20180307)
	d2k-release-20180307: Dune 2000 (release-20180307)
	ra-release-20180307: Red Alert (release-20180307)
	ra-release-20180923: Red Alert (release-20180923)
Loading mod: ra
Exception of type `Eluant.LuaException`: [string "scriptwrapper.lua"]:15: module 'sandbox' not found:
	no field package.preload['sandbox']
	no file '/home/szg/Letöltések/squashfs-root/usr/lib/openr/lua/sandbox.lua'
	no file './sandbox.so'
	no file './sandbox.so'
	no file './loadall.so'
  at Eluant.LuaRuntime.Call (System.Collections.Generic.IList`1[T] args) [0x000c9] in <c8bc0b4612b543268b8307855c69585a>:0 
  at Eluant.LuaRuntime.DoBuffer (System.String str, System.String name) [0x00033] in <c8bc0b4612b543268b8307855c69585a>:0 
  at OpenRA.Scripting.ScriptContext..ctor (OpenRA.World world, OpenRA.Graphics.WorldRenderer worldRenderer, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[T] scripts) [0x000f5] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Scripting.LuaScript.OpenRA.Traits.IWorldLoaded.WorldLoaded (OpenRA.World world, OpenRA.Graphics.WorldRenderer worldRenderer) [0x0001d] in /home/travis/build/OpenRA/OpenRA/OpenRA.Mods.Common/Scripting/LuaScript.cs:43 
  at OpenRA.World.LoadComplete (OpenRA.Graphics.WorldRenderer wr) [0x00080] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.StartGame (System.String mapUID, OpenRA.WorldType type) [0x000c3] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.LoadShellMap () [0x00018] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.LoadScreens.BlankLoadScreen.StartGame (OpenRA.Arguments args) [0x001b4] in /home/travis/build/OpenRA/OpenRA/OpenRA.Mods.Common/LoadScreens/BlankLoadScreen.cs:100 
  at OpenRA.Game.InitializeMod (System.String mod, OpenRA.Arguments args) [0x003b3] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Initialize (OpenRA.Arguments args) [0x004c8] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.InitializeAndRun (System.String[] args) [0x00007] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x0004f] in <b942227eb4f94bfea2ea1dea51477ff6>:0 

AL lib: FreeContext: (0x55a1aff2c340) Deleting 32 Source(s)

```
@szg0000 that is #15691 - see the discussion there for a workaround.
